attributes.action: PEOPLE ON BENEFITS SHOULD ALSO PAY TAX
attributes.additional_details: People on benefits are receiving thousands of pounds each year.  Receiving free housing, free schooling, free NHS treatment and getting money into their pockets.  They get far more than the poor worker who is receiving a low wage.  THEY SHOULD PAY TAX AND FEEL THE PINCH LIKE THE HONEST WORKERS.  I bet their homes are full of luxury goods which the lowly paid can't afford to buy as they pay their own bills and are not scrounging off the taxpayers.
